botMessages.message: Hi, Iâ€™m the Digital Sales Assistant. How can I help you today?

Sorry, I didn't understand that.
Your sales rep doesn't seem to be available right now.

Unfortunately, a system error occurred. I'll connect you to an agent who can help.
Unfortunately, there are no agents available at the moment
Sure! First, what are you inquiring about?
Alright. I'm happy to connect you with our Sales team.

and your last name?

invocationMappings.value: Reach out to the related prospect. They requested a call back from the Sales Bot.

botMessages.message: Can I assist you with anything else?

botQuickReplyOptions.literalValue: Yes - Take me back to the Main Menu
